interpretation:
The Syringe emoji depicts a medical instrument used to inject fluids into the body. In tarot, it can represent healing, medicine, or the need for medical attention. This card can also symbolize addiction or dependency on drugs or other substances.

If this card appears in a reading, it may indicate the need for medical attention or healing. It may also suggest that the seeker is relying too heavily on drugs or other substances to cope with their problems. Alternatively, it could represent a skilled healer or medical professional who is able to provide the necessary care.

Overall, the Syringe card encourages the seeker to take a closer look at their physical or emotional health and make any necessary changes to improve their well-being.
